Name: Gestalt Armory
Description: Provide upgrades for Gestalt Mech Units.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip: Enable Storm Drop Pod to become Storm Weapon Platform after landed. Drop Pod will not cost supply and unranium and will be equipped with Storm Weapon Platform.
Root.Name: Research Storm Weapon Platform

Root.Tooltip: Enable Ragnarok to change its abilities based on the current weapon equipped. These include Covering Fire that can deal aoe dmg, Asgard Fall that is good at crowd control, Thermal Lance that can deal continuous dmg, and Doom Lockdown that can target single unit.
Root.Name: Research Loki System

Root.Tooltip: Ragnarok scans surronding area and locks onto at most 5 enemies. Launch a polariton missile to target and deal 150 aoe dmg.
Root.Name: Research Wide Area Bombardment

Root.Tooltip: Specialized coating. It is said to preach the existence of a creature on a distant planet. Ragnarok gain 1000 health, 6 armor, and can heal itself continuous at rate of 25 health per sec.
Root.Name: Research Nyan Nyan Mecha!

Root.Tooltip: Enable Hammer of God to call down an airstrike, drop a bomb to target area that deals 200 dmg.
Root.Name: Research Air Support

Root.Tooltip: Enable Hammer of God to launch a series of barrage and deal 300 dmg to target area under Siege Mode.
Root.Name: Research Ikarus Missle Pod

Root.Tooltip: Hammer of God gains 400 health, 10 armor, and 0.5 movement speed. Hammer of God will repair itself after combat.
Root.Name: Research Kinetic Armor

Root.Tooltip: Enable Gestalt Overseer to teleport nearby Gestalt combat units and itself to target location.
Root.Name: Research Warp Engine

Root.Tooltip: Enable Gestalt Overseer to be permanently cloaked and gain 150 health, 3 armor, and can repair itself after combat. Meanwhile, Gestalt Overseer will carry a small energy field, allowing nearby Gestalt combat units to switch weapon or recruit.
Root.Name: Research Support Radar
